name: Spartan vs Barbarians: Rise of an Empire
name_original: Spartan vs Barbarians: Rise of an Empire
description:
This is Sparta!
Spartans are back to expand and dominate their Spartan empire.
This time they invaded the barbarians state in an attempt to control the land.
Help them win now!

Features:
- Tap on the left to jump
- Tap on the right to shoot
- Endless running scene
- Cool and entertaining music
- Game center
- Collect power up

Download this game now!
